step_data.thought: Looking at the page, I can see that we're already viewing Beauty & Personal Care products on sale. The current sort order is set to 'Relevance' as indicated by the combobox at element [1500]. To change the sort order to 'Price', I need to click on this combobox and then select the 'Price' option from the dropdown. The combobox element has a value of 'Relevance' and one of its options is 'Price' at element [1502].
